pages.text: The create set of Buddycards is a very easy to collect set, given you have the right machines. There are 27 cards in this set in total, but many more when you consider shiny variants and grades. $(br2)In order to get create set cards, you must craft create set packs.

In order to make create set packs, you must first make shredded Buddycards, you can make these by tossing a Buddycard into crushing wheels, but if you have a few extra packs, you can get more bang for your buck by recycling packs instead of the cards.

pages.title: Create Set Packs
pages.text: Once you have some shredded buddycards, buddysteel nuggets, and brass plates, throw them into a heated mixer in a ratio of 5:1:1 to make create set packs.

pages.title: Create Set Cards
pages.text: The create set packs, as with most packs, will give you 4 cards in total, with only one of them being a shiny variant. $(br2)The cards come in four rarities: common, uncommon, rare, and epic. You can tell them apart by the colors of their corners.

pages.title: Create Set Cards
pages.text: Cards number 1-12 are common with no colored corners, cards number 13-21 are uncommon with 2 yellow corners, cards number 22-25 are rare with 4 blue corners, and cards 26 and 27 are epics with 2 yellow and 2 purple corners. Both shiny and non shiny cards have the same odds for card rarity.

pages.title: Create Set Medal
pages.text: The create set medal can be earned by getting all 27 cards, shiny and not shiny, of the create set. When equipped, it will give you Haste I.

pages.title: Medal Enchantments
pages.text: The medal can also be enchanted with Buddy Binding and Buddy Boost. Buddy Boost I will upgrade the medal to give Haste II, and Buddy Boost II will upgrade it to give Haste III.
